full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL PO GSER GYI LAG PA'I SMON LAM DANG 'BREL BA'I MAR ME JI LTAR 'BUL BA'I TSUL BDE LEGS 'BYUNG GNAS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B (CES PA 'DI NI DAD LDAN RNAM DPYOD LDAN PA'I TSE GZUNGS SOGS KYIS 'DI LTAR GYIS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO BOR SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BSHAD SGRUB @013A *, ,MING CAN GYIS GA-YAR KHRAL DU DGYIS PA'O, ,PAR 'DI NI MI RGEN MKHAN SPRUL GYI MING 'DZIN RTEN 'BREL BKRA SHIS KYIS DANG BAS SGRUBS PA'I DGE BA'I RTZA BA 'DIS SEMS CAN MA LUS PA'I MA RIG PA'I MUN PA SEL NAS YE SHES KYI SNANG BA RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
